name: I'm tired of missing you
description:
Nátalia, a 25-year-old martial artist finds herself in an emotionally complicated situation. For the first time in five years, she'll meet her best friend and crush Lucrezia after she asked her help to leave France and go back home to Rio de Janeiro.

What Nátalia will do once she meets Lucrezia again? Will she let her feelings come out, or will she just deny them?

I'm tired of missing you is a kinect twine made for Yuri Game Jam 2021, about having to face the music and decide if you'll keep chasing a love that might not be there or move on and find someone that makes you happy.

This game is set in the same universe as Slaíne the Slacker and Aston may Die, this is a self-contained story.
